MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G45 postcode area of Glasgow. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 9:50pm. Our emergency response team have arrived in the local area and the team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1:00am. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:02pm on Saturday, 20 March 2021
